description: This file defines data models and enums related to user filter criteria for a Flutter application. It includes enums for categorical attributes (hair color, race, religion), a generic Range class for numerical ranges, and a FilterCriteria class combining these attributes, with serialization/deserialization methods.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: A generic immutable class representing a numeric range with min and max bounds, including serialization and factory methods.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: An immutable class encapsulating user filter preferences across categories like hair color, race, religion, and numeric height/weight ranges, with JSON serialization/deserialization.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a new FilterCriteria with specified attributes overridden.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Serializes the FilterCriteria instance into a JSON map.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates a FilterCriteria instance from a JSON map, with fallback to default values on errors.

methods.name: toJsonString
methods.description: Encodes the FilterCriteria to a compact JSON string.

methods.name: tryFromJsonString
methods.description: Attempts to decode a JSON string into a FilterCriteria instance, returning null on failure.

methods.name: fromJsonDouble
methods.description: Creates a Range<double> from a JSON map with 'min' and 'max' fields.
